item.title: Breaking the Silos: Hybrid & Remote Work
item.description: Our second meetup features several use cases from Belgian tech companies, followed by a panel discussion on hybrid and remote work. The event will be livestreamed online.

item.title: Breaking the Silos: Neurodiversity
item.description: Our first meetup focuses on Neurodiversity (ADHD, ASD, intellectual giftedness, etc.), featuring three live keynote speakers.

item.title: About the Initiative
item.description: Breaking the Silos is all about breaking siloed thinking and approaches within Belgian tech companies, and improving collaboration by: enlightening companies to choose sustainable solutions for problems over short-term fixes inspiring companies to embrace change in their market and in society as a whole building a safe and inclusive work environment for all people involved showcasing the advantages and success stories of breaking siloed thinking. We build a community of like-minded organisations, leaders and people that want to make sustainable change happen.

item.title: Code of Conduct
item.description: All community members, attendees, speakers, sponsors and volunteers of Breaking the Silos are required to agree with the following code of conduct. Organisers will enforce this code throughout all events and in community channels. We are expecting cooperation from all participants and community members to help ensuring a safe environment for everybody. The Quick Version Breaking the Silos is dedicated to providing a harassment-free experience for everyone, regardless of gender, gender identity and expression, age, sexual orientation, disability, physical appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, religion (or lack thereof), or technology choices.

item.title: Our Community
item.description: Meetup.com To become a member and RSVP to our events, join the Breaking the Silos group on Meetup.com. Discord server Discord is a messaging platform similar to Microsoft Teams and Slack. Since October 2022, we maintain a Discord server for chatting with members of the community. You can join the Breaking the Silos Discord server here. Social media You can also find and engage with us on LinkedIn, Mastodon, Instagram, and YouTube.
